## hash dinamico

Na mesma janela

```{ojs}


hash = Generators.observe(notify => {
  const hashchange = () => notify(location.hash);
  hashchange();
  addEventListener("hashchange", hashchange);
  return () => removeEventListener("hashchange", hashchange);
})

```
